sentences.en: Aldermen Sweater told Grinder that starvation was no excuse for dishonesty.
sentences.cn: 参议员斯韦特先生和格林德先生说,饥饿不能作为为非作歹的借口.

sentences.en: Designing the high - speed tool grinder of good performance is a principal condition.
sentences.cn: 开发和研制性能优良的高速刀具磨床是发展高速磨削加工的首要条件.

sentences.en: Master Worker Wang is responsible for the overhaul of this grinder.
Precision molding the surface grinder is the honor of our manufacturing products.
sentences.cn: 精密成型的平面磨床是我们专业制造的荣誉产品.

sentences.en: Strong man, organ grinder, guileless giant, ever willing to be helpful.
sentences.cn: 坚强的人, 器官磨床, 天真的巨人, 都愿意提供帮助.

sentences.en: Such as: lathe, planer, grinder, boring machine, Saw, drill press, press.
sentences.cn: 如: 车床, 刨床, 磨床, 镗床, 锯床, 钻床, 冲床.

sentences.en: The chef used an electric grinder in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 厨师在厨房使用电动磨碎机.

sentences.en: The company mainly produces chemical equipment - centrifuges, grinder, mixer, dryer product line.
sentences.cn: 公司主要生产化工设备 - 离心机, 粉碎机, 混合机, 干燥机系列产品.

sentences.en: The grinder can be used for grinding coffee beans.
sentences.cn: 研磨机可以被用来研磨咖啡豆.

sentences.en: The grinder is used for making precision tooling.
sentences.cn: 这台研磨机用于制作精细工具。

sentences.en: The grinder was powered by a windmill.
sentences.cn: 这磨盘由风车提供动力.

sentences.en: The spiral nebulae were scratches left by the grinder.
sentences.cn: 螺旋状的星云是研磨者所留下的痕迹.

sentences.en: The workers of the factory went off the beaten track and designed a new - type grinder.
sentences.cn: 该厂工人打破常规,设计了一台新型磨床.

sentences.en: They have ordered a new grinder.
sentences.cn: 他们订购了一台新磨床.

sentences.en: Vertical grinder belongs to roller grinder by externally force.
sentences.cn: 立式磨煤机属于外加力型辊盘式磨煤机.

sentences.en: Wash cattlefish, wipe dry and mince then in a meat grinder.
sentences.cn: 墨鱼肉洗净, 抹乾水切碎,放入碎肉机内搅烂.

trans.tran_cn: 研磨机，粉碎机，研磨者，磨刀匠，臼齿，〈口〉用功学生
